SmProcessing

Class FilterAndIntegrateProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmProcessing.FilterAndIntegrateProcess

  • public class FilterAndIntegrateProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs the filtering of the acceleration array and its integration to velocity and again to displacement.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FilterAndIntegrateProcess(double lowcut, double highcut, int numroll, double tapertime, int startInd, boolean fftint)
      Constructor simply initializes filter variables

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void filterAndIntegrate(double[] accel, double dtime) 
      double getCalculatedTaper()
      getter for the taper length calculated for the start of the array
      double getConfigTaper()
      getter for the taper length used at the end of the array
      double[] getDisplacement()
      getter for the displacement array after 2nd integration from filtered acceleration
      double getInitialDis()
      getter for the initial displacement value
      double getInitialVel()
      getter for the initial velocity value
      double[] getPaddedAccel()
      getter for the padded acceleration array after filtering
      double[] getVelocity()
      getter for the velocity array after integration from filtered acceleration

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FilterAndIntegrateProcess

        public FilterAndIntegrateProcess(double lowcut,
                                 double highcut,
                                 int numroll,
                                 double tapertime,
                                 int startInd,
                                 boolean fftint)
        Constructor simply initializes filter variables
        Parameters:
        lowcut - filter low cutoff frequency
        highcut - filter high cutoff frequency
        numroll - the filter roll off, which is 1/2 the filter order
        tapertime - the taper length value from the configuration file
        startInd - the array index for the start of the event
        fftint - flag for frequency-based integration

    • Method Detail

      • filterAndIntegrate

        public void filterAndIntegrate(double[] accel,
                               double dtime)
                        throws SmException
        Parameters:
        accel - this array is modified during processing, with the final array containing the filtered acceleration values
        dtime - the sample time interval (seconds/sample) for the record
        Throws:
        SmException - if unable to calculate valid filter parameters

        public double[] getVelocity()
        getter for the velocity array after integration from filtered acceleration

        the velocity array

        getter for the taper length calculated for the start of the array
        Returns:

      • getConfigTaper

        public double getConfigTaper()
        getter for the taper length used at the end of the array
        Returns:
        the final taper length in seconds
